text: Be-shak khasaray mein paray woh log jinhon ney Allah say milney ki takzeeb ki yahan tak kay jab woh moyyen waqt unn per dafatan aa phonchay ga kahen gay kay haaye afsos humari kotahi per jo iss kay baray mein hui aur halat inn ki yeh hogi kay woh apney baar apni peethon per laaday hongay khoob sunn lo kay buri hogi woh cheez jiss ko woh laaden gay
